p: The analysis of hematological parameters, which included WBC, LYM, GRA, HCT, MCV, MCH, MCHC, RDW, and MPV in rats treated with HS extract (500, 1000, and 2000 mg/kg) did not differ significantly from those of control rats ( Table 3). However, the administration of the HS water extract to rats at 500 mg/kg and 1000 mg/kg resulted in a statistically significant decrease in platelets (PLT) ( P < 0.05). At the highest dose (2000 mg/kg), the HS extract caused a significant increase in RBC and HGB ( P < 0.05).
